content:
topic table
identifier                 topic name    topic description                                                             attribute
--------------------------  ---------------  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
b15c5a744a2f4ff6b54f814e6b  Multiple Users   Describes the process of purchasing and managing licenses for multiple users.    a13c2a6c66524ed4b8ee04cad1, 0be039f488874fefa87283ace0
cf0d0a0635764eabb33b0c7e60  Renew License    Explains how to renew an expired or soon-to-expire software license.             c9d6a24e67044f1bbb96f42129, 25d06e5ce66d4403acf9e9dfa5, b2998f9353ee43fbb3e96d4155, 0af8c9e9647f45d892414fae89
e5a0fa9a74d34cf1b6aef4ee37  Single User      Outlines the process of purchasing and managing a single user software license.  1aece083985146548fa0b32ad0, 6847c8c3ebdc4dc89ad9286c1d, ddb34c095aeb4a058d790739b6, 8352bbaa6e9c4823bc59c0c4cd
3681cc8386174ef9a889c8ad25  Lost License     Explains the steps to recover a lost or stolen software license.                 5333cdeba467437a91aa7dc8d4

entity table
entity identifier                   entity name      entity description                                           example values
--------------------------  ---------------  -----------------------------------------------------------  ----------------------------------------
a13c2a6c66524ed4b8ee04cad1  license_type     The type of software license in question.                    single_user, multiple_user, site_license
0be039f488874fefa87283ace0  number_of_users  The number of users who will be using the software.
c9d6a24e67044f1bbb96f42129  license_type     The type of license to be renewed.
25d06e5ce66d4403acf9e9dfa5  expiration_date  The date when the current license expires.
b2998f9353ee43fbb3e96d4155  license_number   The unique number associated with the license.
0af8c9e9647f45d892414fae89  licensee_name    The name of the person or entity who owns the license.
1aece083985146548fa0b32ad0  product_name     The name of the product being licensed.
6847c8c3ebdc4dc89ad9286c1d  license_type     The type of license being purchased.
ddb34c095aeb4a058d790739b6  duration         The duration of the license.
8352bbaa6e9c4823bc59c0c4cd  payment_method   The method of payment.
5333cdeba467437a91aa7dc8d4  software_name    The name of the software for which the license key is lost.
give me a joke about the context

chosen: Why did the software license go to the bar? Because it heard the bartender was hiring!
rejected:
Sure! Here's a joke about the context:

Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the context and blushed at all the potential topics and entities it could discuss!
